Sentencas: Composites consisting of SrTiO3-based perovskite and either yttria-stabilized zirconia or ceria were investigated.
Titulo: Interactions between components of SrTi0.98Nb0.02O3-δ-YSZ and SrTi0.98Nb0.02O3-δ-CeO2 composites

Sentencas: The mechanical compatibility and possible inter-diffusion between phases were characterized by scanning electron microscopy, X-ray diffraction, and energy-dispersive X-ray spectroscopy.
Titulo: Interactions between components of SrTi0.98Nb0.02O3-δ-YSZ and SrTi0.98Nb0.02O3-δ-CeO2 composites

Sentencas: A gradual disappearance of Ce-containing phases with an increase in the temperature of reduction in hydrogen was noticed.
Titulo: Interactions between components of SrTi0.98Nb0.02O3-δ-YSZ and SrTi0.98Nb0.02O3-δ-CeO2 composites

Sentencas: Moreover, a diffusion of Sr, Ti, and Ce was observed between the composites and the yttria-stabilized zirconia electrolyte support in the conditions of high temperature (13001400 degrees C) reduction in H2.
Titulo: Interactions between components of SrTi0.98Nb0.02O3-δ-YSZ and SrTi0.98Nb0.02O3-δ-CeO2 composites
